title: 169. Feedback Sessions (Ep. 1) with Ben Hobson
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: In this brand new W&N spin-off series we chat about the messiness of writing, the zero draft, agent feedback and early readers. We discuss how the raw writing is shaped into something beautiful and palatable. Join Ben Hobson chat about his process.
itunes:subtitle: In this brand new W&N spin-off series we chat aboâ€¦
description: In this brand new W&N spin-off series we chat about the messiness of writing, the zero draft, agent feedback and early readers. We discuss how the raw writing is shaped into something beautiful and palatable. Join Ben Hobson chat about his process.
